md:
giải nghĩa từ "postponed" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Postponed** (verb)

* Meaning: to delay or put off something until a later time
* Vietnamese: hoãn lại, trì hoãn

Example sentence: The meeting was postponed until next week due to the weather.

* Related words: delay, put off, reschedule, adjourn

**Postponed** (adjective)

* Meaning: delayed or put off until a later time
* Vietnamese: đã được hoãn lại, đã được trì hoãn

Example sentence: The postponed game will be played next Saturday.

* Related words: delayed, put off, rescheduled, adjourned
html:

Postponed (verb)

  • Meaning: to delay or put off something until a later time
  • Vietnamese: hoãn lại, trì hoãn

Example sentence: The meeting was postponed until next week due to the weather.

  • Related words: delay, put off, reschedule, adjourn

Postponed (adjective)

  • Meaning: delayed or put off until a later time
  • Vietnamese: đã được hoãn lại, đã được trì hoãn

Example sentence: The postponed game will be played next Saturday.

  • Related words: delayed, put off, rescheduled, adjourned
